agent_utterance: Tonight, when stress or a busy moment hits, do a 60-second pause: take 3 slow breaths, drink a glass of water, and immediately log your hunger. If you’re still hungry after the pause, reach for the smallest pre-portioned option you’ve planned for evenings (for example, a single piece of fruit or a defined small snack) and log it. Keeping this ultra-simple anchor and your hunger rating consistent helps you stay on track and move toward your goal.

agent_utterance: Nice work keeping the ultra-simple anchor. Tonight, after you log your hunger, add a short 2–3 minute pause before deciding on food.
